title: Paradigm
content:
Damn, I like that font. It has been growing on me. What does it cost? (I know I am too lazy too look it up, but I know Nick is in here all the time).

(For those people who might read this months from now, I will point out that Paradigm is the featured face at the time of this posting.)
author: Don McCahill

comments.content: Thanks Ricardo. That price is within my range, too.
